title: Gift Of Magic icon (still?)
body:
Alrighty, so, my friend and I gifted each other Xayah, and both of us have yet to receive our icons. I'm just wondering at this point if we had done something wrong? 

Were we supposed to gift eachother Xayah, AND Rakan? 
Or was one of us supposed to gift Xayah, and the other Rakan? 

Either way, we don't have icons still, so I was just curious of if we'd ever receive them. Thanks a bunch!

replies.body: I got your accounts pulled up and confirmed that both of you did qualify for that Gift of Magic icon, go ahead and check your accounts for it ^_^!
